noun.description: A person who accepts a situation as it is and is prepared to deal with it accordingly.
examples: I am a realist, with no time for your world of make believe

noun.description: An artist or writer whose style is characterized by the representation of people or things as they actually are.
A person who believes in the theory of realism.

adjective.description: Accepting a situation as it is and being prepared to deal with it accordingly.
examples: a realist view of the world, its problems, and its future

adjective.description: Representing a person or thing in a way that is accurate and true to life.
Relating to or denoting the theory of realism.
